title: Different fonts
content:
Can someone tell me what different font these are?  
Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ashleigh\_daniel\_invite\_web\_d1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/typophile.com/files/ashleigh_daniel_invite_web_d1.jpg) | 180.02 KB |
author: Lennartvh

comments.content: What a shame that the other one is not Worcester.

Asleigh Daniel/Greatly Anticipated/Adam Ballroom: [Jeeves](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/jeeves)  
ON SATURDAY/AT HALF PAST SIX.../601 SPADINA.../COCKTAILS...: [Engravers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/engravers)  
ANN CLARK/BENJAMIN SMITH: [Edition](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.dafont.com/edition.font)/ [Long Tall Sally](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.ffonts.net/Long-Tall-Sally-EEN-Plain.font), manually slanted, should do the job. Commercial alternatives: [Cammerton A](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/paratype/camerton_cyrillic_ot), [Goldwater](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.linotype.com/fr/305246/goldwaterregular-police.html)  
TOGETHER WITH THEIR FAMILIES/INVITE YOU TO CELEBRATE: very " [Empire](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/empire). More possibilities: [Iris](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/iris), [Silhouette](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/silhouette), [Camerton C](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/paratype/camerton_cyrillic_ot)  
2014/THE THIRD OF MAY: [Encorpada](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516000745/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/encorpada)
Is there an alternative (or similar) font for Jeeves?
